card.name: Elder Angel Ethella
card.text: Flying, lifelink At the beginning of your end step, if your life total is at least 6 greater than your starting life total, exile each nonland permanent controlled by an opponent an Angel dealt combat damage to this turn.

card.name: Glorious Chaplain
card.text: Flying When Glorious Chaplain enters, create two 1/1 white Cleric creature tokens. {4}{W}: Until end of turn, creatures you control have base power and toughness X/X, where X is your devotion to white. (Each {W} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to white.)

card.name: The Angel's Renown
Velia Sol, Queen of Flights
card.text: As long as Velia Sol isn't on the battlefield, she's a 4/4 Angel creature in addition to her other types. [+1]: Put a flying counter and a lifelink counter on up to one target creature. It becomes an Angel. [0]: Until end of turn, Velia Sol becomes a 4/4 Angel creature with flying, lifelink, and indestructible. [-7]: Your life total becomes equal to your starting life total plus 10. If you didn't gain life this way, you win the game.

card.name: Elder Sphinx Veritanos
card.text: Flying, ward {2} Veritanos's power is equal to the number of cards in your hand. Whenever Veritanos attacks, surveil 1. Whenever you scry or surveil, draw a card.

card.name: Omniscient Witness
card.text: Flying Whenever Omniscient Witness deals combat damage to a player, draw X cards, then discard two cards, where X is your devotion to blue. (Each {U} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to blue.)

card.name: The Sphinx's Expertise
Nefeti, On Wind and Wisdom
card.text: [+1]: Surveil 2. [-2]: Create a 2/2 blue Sphinx creature token with flying and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card, then discard a card." [-2]: Until end of turn, target blue instant or sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost.

card.name: Elder Demon Aternox
card.text: Flying Whenever you cast a spell, each opponent loses 3 life unless they discard a card or sacrifice a nonland permanent. Pay 6 life: Add {B}{B}{B}{B}{B}{B}.

card.name: Herald of Damnation
card.text: Flying Whenever you attack, return target creature card with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped and attacking with a finality counter on it, where X is your devotion to black. (Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.)

card.name: The Demon's Covenant
Liliana, Apocryphal Heretic
card.text: [+1]: Create a Walking Corpse token. (It's a {1}{B} 2/2 Zombie creature.) [-2]: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is your devotion to black. (Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.) [-3]: You may put a Demon card from your hand or graveyard onto the battlefield.

card.name: Elder Dragon Yadil
card.text: Flying Ward—Pay 6 life. Whenever Yadil attacks, discard your hand, then draw two cards. For each card type among cards discarded this way, create a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying that's tapped and attacking. Exile those tokens at end of combat.

card.name: Starstorm Emberkite
card.text: Flying, haste Once each turn, you may cast a red card from your hand with mana value X or less without paying its mana cost, where X is your devotion to red. (Each {R} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to red.)

card.name: The Dragon's Majesty
Sarkhan, Scalebound
card.text: When Sarkhan enters, invoke the Dragons. (Begin or advance the Path of the Dragon.) [+1]: Up to one target creature gets +2/+0 and gains menace until end of turn. [0]: Discard a card, then exile the top two cards of your library. You may play one of them this turn. [-6]: Create a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying. Then each Dragon you control deals damage equal to its power to any target.

card.name: Elder Hydra Vidir
card.text: Trample, vigilance, reach When Vidir enters or a player casts a spell, Vidir fights up to one other target creature.

card.name: Torrent of Fangs
card.text: Ward {5} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {5}.) Each other creature you control enters with X additional +1/+1 counters on it, where X is your devotion to green. (Each {G} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to green.)

card.name: The Hydra's Persistence
Kism, Threads of Destiny
card.text: Whenever you activate a loyalty ability of Kism, create a 0/0 green Hydra creature token with a +1/+1 counter on it. [+1]: Reveal the top card of your library. Put it into your hand if it's a land card or if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater. [-2]: Destroy target creature with flying. [-6]: Put two +1/+1 counters on each creature you control. Those creatures gain haste and trample until end of turn.

card.name: Prophet of Dawn
card.text: Flying, lifelink Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to X target creatures, where X is the amount of life gained.

card.name: Erin, Beacon of Humility
card.text: Flash Flying Whenever Erin enters or attacks, up to one target creature has base power and toughness 1/1 and loses all abilities until end of turn.

card.name: Aethelian Shepherd
card.text: Convoke Cleric (Your Cleric creatures can help cast this spell. Each Cleric you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Flying, vigilance Other creatures you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance.

card.name: Bishop of Sophic Salt
card.text: When Bishop of Sophic Salt enters, you may invoke the Angels. (Begin or advance the Path of the Angel.) Bishop of Sophic Salt has base power and toughness 4/4 and flying and vigilance as long as you've gained life this turn.

card.name: Faithlight Magister
card.text: You have hexproof. If you would lose the game, instead your life total becomes equal to your devotion to white, then exile Faithlight Magister. (Each {W} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to white.)

card.name: Rose Court Justicar
card.text: Whenever a creature you control enters, create an Idol token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.") Whenever Rose Court Justicar attacks, you may sacrifice an Idol. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Judgment of the Tiranos
card.text: For each mana value X or less, exile up to one target nonland permanent with that mana value.

card.name: Divine Vigil
card.text: This spell costs {X} less to cast, where X is the amount of life you've gained this turn. Create three 3/3 white Angel creature tokens with flying.

card.name: Ethella's Command
card.text: Choose two — • Target player invokes the Angels. (They begin or advance the Path of the Angel.) • You and target opponent each draw two cards. • Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to three target creatures. • Exile target creature with power 4 or greater.

card.name: Elegant Waveshaper
card.text: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) When Elegant Waveshaper enters, create a number of 0/1 blue Merfolk creature tokens with prowess equal to your devotion to blue. (Each {U} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to blue.)

card.name: Squire of Aequitius
card.text: When Squire of Aequitius enters, create a 2/2 blue Sphinx creature token with flying and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card, then discard a card." Whenever you draw your fourth card each turn, create a token that's a copy of target Sphinx you control, except the copy isn't legendary.

card.name: Vaetas, the Worldwatcher
card.text: Flying Whenever an opponent casts a spell, create an Intel token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Surveil 1, then draw a card.) Sacrifice seven Intels: Draw seven cards.

card.name: Curio Antiquary
card.text: Affinity for artifacts Flying When Curio Antiquary enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library, then separate them into a face-down pile and a face-up pile. An opponent chooses one. Put the chosen pile into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: Precognos Augury
card.text: When Precognos Augury enters, invoke the Sphinxes. (Begin or advance the Path of the Sphinx.) At the beginning of your postcombat main phase, if there are twenty or more cards in your graveyard, you may cast a card from your hand without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Spectral Aethergate
card.text: At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player draws an additional card. {1}{U}{U}, Sacrifice Spectral Aethergate: Create a 0/0 blue Elemental creature token with "This creature gets +1/+1 for each card in your hand." Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Overwhelming Wisdom
card.text: Counter target spell. Create X Intel tokens, where X is that spell's mana value. (They're artifacts with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Surveil 1, then draw a card.)

card.name: Sphinx of Cryptic Passage
card.text: Flash Flying While you're looking at this card while surveiling or scrying, you may cast this card from your library.

card.name: Veritanos's Command
card.text: Choose two — • Target player invokes the Sphinxes. (They begin or advance the Path of the Sphinx.) • Gain control of target creature with mana value 2 or less. • Tap up to two target creatures. Put a stun counter on each of them. • Target player surveils 2, then draws a card.

card.name: Baron of Calamity
card.text: Menace Whenever an opponent loses life, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

card.name: Naev, the Sinner's Bane
card.text: Flying When Naev enters, target opponent separates each creature, planeswalker, and enchantment they control into two piles. You choose one of them. They sacrifice each permanent in the chosen pile.

card.name: Embodiment of Anguish
card.text: Menace At the beginning of combat on your turn, each player sacrifices a creature.

card.name: Shadowbrand Templar
card.text: When Shadowbrand Templar enters, invoke the Demons. (Begin or advance the Path of the Demon.) {T}, Sacrifice Shadowbrand Templar: You may cast a Demon card from your hand. If you do, pay life equal to its mana value rather than pay its mana cost.

card.name: Il-Ergal Soothsayer
card.text: When Il-Ergal Soothsayer enters, you may pay X life, where X is your devotion to black. If you do, draw X cards. (Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.)

card.name: Reaper's Promenade
card.text: Destroy any number of target creatures and planeswalkers with total mana value of exactly 13.

card.name: Vessel of Vile Truths
card.text: When Vessel of Vile Truths enters, create two tapped 5/5 black Demon creature tokens with flying, then put ten stun counters on each of them. At the beginning of your end step, if an opponent lost life this turn, remove a stun counter from each Demon you control. Do the same if an opponent discarded a card this turn and if a creature an opponent controlled died this turn.

card.name: Kaelax Blood Pact
card.text: Activate each ability of Kaelax Blood Pact only as a sorcery and only once each turn. {B}: You draw a card and you lose 1 life. {1}{B}: Each opponent discards a card. {2}{B}: Each opponent sacrifices a creature. At the beginning of your precombat main phase, exile the top seven cards of your library.

card.name: Aternox's Command
card.text: Choose two — • Target player invokes the Demons. (They begin or advance the Path of the Demon.) • Target creature gains deathtouch and indestructible until end of turn. • Target opponent loses 3 life and you gain 3 life. • Target creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn.

card.name: Calamitous Hellwing
card.text: Flying, haste Calamitous Hellwing has double strike as long as it's attacking. {2}{R}: An opponent may sacrifice a permanent. If none does, Calamitous Hellwing gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Vashai, the Pyretic Roar
card.text: Flying When Vashai enters, destroy all nonbasic lands. For each land destroyed this way, Vashai deals 2 damage to its controller, then that player creates a tapped colorless Mountain land token.

card.name: Antiquities Hoarder
card.text: Flying Antiquities Hoarder can't attack or block unless it has five or more counters on it. Whenever one or more artifacts you control enter, put a +1/+1 counter on Antiquities Hoarder and Antiquities Hoarder deals 1 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Adishii Stormcaller
card.text: When Adishii Stormcaller enters, invoke the Dragons. (Begin or advance the Path of the Dragon.) {2}{R}{R}: Create a token that's a copy of another target creature you control. That token has haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Iron Eye Captain
card.text: Double strike Whenever Iron Eye Captain attacks for the first time each turn, untap any number of target creatures you control with total power less than or equal to your devotion to red. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase. (Each {R} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to red.)

card.name: Atsinil Freeblade
card.text: Agile (This creature deals combat damage first as long as it's attacking.) Whenever Atsinil Freeblade attacks, you may sacrifice an artifact. If you do, create a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying that's tapped and attacking. Exile that token at end of combat.

card.name: Earthshatter Prodigy
card.text: When Earthshatter Prodigy enters, you may discard a Mountain card. If you do, exile the top two cards of your library. You may play those cards until the end of your next turn. Whenever you cast a red spell, add {R}{R}.

card.name: Bloodfire Brand
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, exile target instant or sorcery card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard. Whenever one or more creatures you control attack, you may cast copies of up to that many cards exiled with Bloodfire Brand without paying their mana costs.

card.name: Yadil's Command
card.text: Choose two — • Target player invokes the Dragons. (They begin or advance the Path of the Dragon.) • Creatures target player controls get +2/+0 until end of turn. • Destroy up to two target artifacts. • Yadil's Command deals 2 damage to each of up to two targets.

card.name: Keeper of the Godhold
card.text: Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, create an Idol token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.") Whenever a +1/+1 counter is put on Keeper of the Godhold, draw a card. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: Rampaging Hydra
card.text: Haste, challenge (This creature can't be blocked by more than one creature.) Rampaging Hydra enters with four +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever Rampaging Hydra survives damage, double the number of +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Virulent Scourge
card.text: When Virulent Scourge enters, destroy target noncreature permanent. Whenever a noncreature permanent an opponent controls dies, if it's a land, you gain 3 life. Otherwise, create a 0/0 green Hydra creature token with a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to that permanent's mana value.

card.name: Uthrun Auspex
card.text: When Uthrun Auspex enters, invoke the Hydras. (Begin or advance the Path of the Hydra.) If one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on a creature you control, that many plus one +1/+1 counters are put on it instead.

card.name: Oridian Clique
card.text: Reach Oridian Clique's power is equal to your devotion to green. (Each {G} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to green.) When Oridian Clique dies, you draw cards and gain life equal to its power.

card.name: Burgeoning Wildwood
card.text: Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, create a 0/0 green Hydra creature token with a +1/+1 counter on it. At the beginning of your end step, put a +1/+1 counter on each Hydra you control.

card.name: Everbough Oracle
card.text: You may play an additional land each turn. Whenever you play your second land each turn, draw a card. At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control ten or more lands, untap each Forest you control. They become 3/3 green Elemental creatures with haste until end of turn. They're still lands.

card.name: Wondrous Genesis
card.text: Look at the top X cards of your library. You may put a creature card with mana value X or less from among them onto the battlefield with X additional +1/+1 counters on it. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Vidir's Command
card.text: Choose two — • Target player invokes the Hydras. (They begin or advance the Path of the Hydra.) • Target player gains 7 life. • Return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand. • Each creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.

card.name: Savos, Hand of Justice
card.text: Flying {W}{W}: Savos gains vigilance and lifelink until end of turn. {U}{U}: Counter target spell that targets an Angel or Sphinx you control. {2}{W}{U}: Creatures you control with flying get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Devora, the Persecutor
card.text: Flying Whenever you draw your second card each turn, each opponent discards a card. Whenever an opponent draws their second card each turn, you draw two cards.

card.name: Slaughtermonger Huaxi
card.text: Flying At the beginning of combat on your turn, an opponent may have you gain control of a creature they control. If they do, tap Huaxi, then that creature gains haste until end of turn. Sacrifice that creature at end of combat.

card.name: Ati-Iri, the Evervisage
card.text: Flying When Ati-Iri enters, choose target nonbasic permanent an opponent controls. If it's a creature or planeswalker, Ati-Iri deals 10 damage to it. Otherwise, destroy it.

card.name: Oyana, the Shattered One
card.text: Flying Oyana enters with four +1/+1 counters on it. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Oyana: Return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield with a finality counter on it. Activate only as a sorcery. Whenever a creature you control with a finality counter on it is exiled from the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Oyana.

card.name: Zora and Aroz, Twin Souls
card.text: Flying, lifelink At the beginning of your end step, if your life total is greater than your starting life total, you may pay up to X life, where X is the difference. If you do, exile target creature card with mana value X from your graveyard, then create a 3/3 white Angel creature token with flying. It has all abilities of the exiled card.

card.name: Vivix, Pustulent Maw
card.text: Vivix enters with X plus one +1/+1 counters on it. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Vivix: Target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. {1}, Sacrifice another creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Vivix.

card.name: Multirus, Symbiotic Sage
card.text: Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, surveil 1. At the beginning of your end step, you may put a land card from your graveyard onto the battlefield tapped. {8}{G}{U}: Put five +1/+1 counters on Multirus. Draw five cards.

card.name: Incignos, Ash in the Wind
card.text: Flying Whenever you create a token, draw a card. At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a token that's a copy of another target creature you control, except it has haste. Sacrifice that token at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Atsaeri, the Cindersoul
card.text: Flying, vigilance The first time each turn a source you control would deal noncombat damage, it deals 4 damage instead.

card.name: Chitinous Escort
card.text: When Chitinous Escort enters, create a tapped Polyp Pools token. (It's a Shapeshifter kindred land with changeling and "{T}: Add {C}.") When Chitinous Escort dies, draw a card.

card.name: Forge the First Seal
card.text: Create a 0/0 green Hydra creature token with a +1/+1 counter on it, a 2/2 blue Sphinx token with flying and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card, then discard a card", a 3/3 white Angel creature token with flying, a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying, and a 5/5 black Demon creature token with flying.

card.name: Lordsworn Chariot
card.text: Whenever Lordsworn Chariot attacks, it deals 1 damage to any target, you gain 1 life, and you draw a card. If you control an attacking legendary creature, instead Lordsworn Chariot deals 3 damage to any target, you gain 3 life and you draw three cards. Crew 3

card.name: Monolith Architect
card.text: Whenever Monolith Architect enters or you cast an artifact spell, create an Idol token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.") Sacrifice two artifacts: Draw a card. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Mons Miralis, Lustrous Apex
card.text: As Mons Miralis enters, choose a color. {T}: Add one mana of the chosen color. {2}, {T}: You may cast a spell of the chosen color with mana value less than or equal to your devotion to the chosen color from your hand without paying its mana cost. (Each colored mana symbol in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to that color.)

card.name: Disciple of the Tiranos
card.text: Angel spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Whenever an Angel you control enters, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Arbiter of Equity
card.text: Flying During your turn, your opponents can't cast spells that target or activate abilities that target.

card.name: Unwavering Andi
card.text: Vigilance Unwavering Andi gets +3/+3 as long as your life total is at least 3 greater than your starting life total.

card.name: Aethelian Chronomancer
card.text: Flash When Aethelian Chronomancer enters, exile up to one other target creature you control. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled by paying {2} rather than paying its mana cost.

card.name: Zephyr Legionnaire
card.text: Flying Whenever Zephyr Legionnaire attacks, create a 1/1 white Cleric creature token that's tapped and attacking. If you control three or more attacking Clerics, create a 3/3 white Angel creature token with flying that's tapped and attacking instead.

card.name: Allegiant Cavalier
card.text: Agile (This creature deals combat damage first as long as it's attacking.) At the beginning of your end step, create an Idol token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.")

card.name: Inspired Fateseeker
card.text: Flying Prestige (Once when this deals combat damage to a player, you may put a +1/+1 counter on it to activate one of its abilities without paying the cost.) {3}{W}: Return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield with a finality counter on it. It can't block this turn.

card.name: Guardian of Eteris
card.text: Lifelink Whenever a nontoken creature you control enters, create a 1/1 white Cleric creature token. If this is the second time this ability has triggered this turn, invoke the Angels. (Begin or advance the Path of the Angel.)

card.name: Luminous Monarch
card.text: Once during each of your turns, you may cast a permanent spell from your graveyard with mana value less than or equal to devotion to white. That spell enters with a finality counter on it. (Each {W} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to white.)

card.name: Halle, the Savior
card.text: Flying When Halle enters, you gain 3 life for each Angel you control.

card.name: Set in Stone
card.text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker. Its controller creates two Idol tokens. (They're artifacts with "{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.")

card.name: Liberated March
card.text: Creatures target player controls get +1/+1 until end of turn. Target creature you control gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Empyrean Aegis
card.text: Enchant creature When Empyrean Aegis enters, invoke the Angels. (Begin or advance the Path of the Angel.) Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has flying.

card.name: Radiance of the Meek
card.text: When Radiance of the Meek enters, create a 1/1 white Cleric creature token. Creatures you control with base power 1 have double strike.

card.name: Ethella Spreads Faith
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) Invoke the Angels. (Begin or advance the Path of the Angel.) Exile up to one target nonland permanent until you control no Sagas or Angels. Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. It gains lifelink until end of turn.

card.name: Disciple of the Aequitius
card.text: Sphinx spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Whenever a Sphinx you control enters, surveil 1.

card.name: Aether Locksmith
card.text: Prestige (Once when this deals combat damage to a player, you may put a +1/+1 counter on it to activate one of its abilities without paying the cost.) {2}{U}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Silthion Gargantuan
card.text: Silthion Gargantuan enters tapped with eight stun counters on it. Whenever you draw your second card each turn, untap Silthion Gargantuan. {5}{U}{U}: Draw a card.

card.name: Wise Prognosticator
card.text: Flying The first time you scry or surveil each turn, you may look at an additional two cards.

card.name: Vizier of Many Ends
card.text: Flying, ward {2} If you would draw a card while your library has no cards in it, you win the game instead.

card.name: Snapfly Stalking
card.text: Create two 2/2 blue Sphinx creature tokens with flying and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card, then discard a card."

card.name: Current Distortionist
card.text: Flash When Current Distortionist enters, exile up to one target instant or sorcery card with mana value less than or equal to your devotion to blue from your graveyard. Until end of turn, you may cast that card without paying its mana cost. (Each {U} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to blue.)

card.name: Custos, the Judge
card.text: Flying At the beginning of your end step, untap up to three target lands, then draw cards until you have three cards in your hand.

card.name: Disdainful Stroke
card.text: Counter target spell with mana value 4 or greater.

card.name: Survey Elder Runes
card.text: Return up to one target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. Invoke the Sphinxes. Exile Survey Elder Runes. (Begin or advance the Path of the Sphinx.)

card.name: Rippling Thoughts
card.text: Draw three cards, then discard two cards unless you discard a blue card.

card.name: Eavesdrop
card.text: Create two Intel tokens. (They're artifacts with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Surveil 1, then draw a card.")

card.name: Rebuff the Untethered
card.text: Return up to two target creatures to their owners' hands. Invoke the Sphinxes. (Begin or advance the Path of the Sphinx.)

card.name: Praecognos Indoctrination
card.text: Enchant creature You control enchanted creature. Enchanted creature is a Wizard with base power and toughness 1/1 and loses all abilities.

card.name: Veritanos Teaches Curiosity
card.text: Invoke the Sphinxes. (Begin or advance the Path of the Sphinx.) Until your next turn, you can cast spells as though they had flash. Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player this turn, look at that many cards from the top of your library. Put one into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Disciple of the Il-Ergal
card.text: Demon spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Whenever a Demon you control enters, each opponent loses 1 life.

card.name: Perpetual Whisper
card.text: Perpetual Whisper can't block. You may cast Perpetual Whisper from your graveyard by exiling another creature card from your graveyard in addition to paying its other costs.

card.name: Inkling Harvester
card.text: Whenever an opponent discards a card, put a +1/+1 counter on Inkling Harvester. When Inkling Harvester dies, target opponent loses life equal to its power.

card.name: Kaelax Reaper
card.text: Prestige (Once when this deals combat damage to a player, you may put a +1/+1 counter on it to activate one of its abilities without paying the cost.) {2}{B}, Sacrifice another creature: Draw a card. You gain 1 life.

card.name: Imperious Egoist
card.text: When Imperious Egoist enters, create an Idol token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.") Whenever you sacrifice a nonland permanent, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Shaithana
card.text: Deathtouch Whenever Shaithana attacks a player with no cards in their hand, that player's life total becomes 1.

card.name: Quag Prowler
card.text: When Quag Prowler enters, choose one or two target creatures and/or planeswalkers an opponent controls with total mana value X or less and destroy them, where X is your devotion to black. (Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.)

card.name: Ravael, the Shadow
card.text: Flying When Ravael enters, target opponent mills four cards, then exile a nonland card from that player's graveyard. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as if it were mana of any color to cast it.

card.name: Peace at Last
card.text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker. You lose life equal to the number of cards in its controller's hand.

card.name: Blood Begets Blood
card.text: Target opponent sacrifices a nontoken creature. If the sacrificed creature had mana value 2 or less, draw a card.

card.name: Perilous Brainwork
card.text: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card if it has mana value 2 or less or if you control a Demon.

card.name: Macabre Echoes
card.text: Return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Draw a card. You gain 2 life. Each opponent discards a card and loses 2 life.

card.name: Soul Transfusion
card.text: Invoke the Demons. When you do, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. (Begin or advance the Path of the Demon.)

card.name: Archdemon's Mantle
card.text: Enchant creature When Archdemon's Mantle enters, invoke the Demons. (Begin or advance the Path of the Demon.) Enchanted creature has "Sacrifice another creature: This creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn."

card.name: Aternox Imparts Humility
card.text: Invoke the Demons. (Begin or advance the Path of the Demon.) Each opponent sacrifices a nonland permanent, discards a card, and loses 3 life. Put target creature card with mana value 3 or less in a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Disciple of the Adishii
card.text: Dragon spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Whenever a Dragon you control enters, target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Shrieking Magmaw
card.text: Menace Whenever you sacrifice an artifact, put a +1/+1 counter on Shrieking Magmaw.

card.name: Soulblaze Shaman
card.text: {T}: Add {R}. If this mana is spent on a Dragon spell, it gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: High Keep Plunderer
card.text: Flying Whenever High Keep Plunderer attacks, you may sacrifice an artifact. If you do, High Keep Plunderer deals 2 damage to defending player. If you don't, create a Treasure token.

card.name: Resolute Geomancer
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, create an X/1 red Elemental creature token with haste, where X is your devotion to red. Exile that token at end of combat. (Each {R} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to red.)

card.name: Mortar Emissary
card.text: Flying, haste {2}{R}: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Forger of Convictions
card.text: Prestige (Once when this deals combat damage to a player, you may put a +1/+1 counter on it to activate one of its abilities without paying the cost.) {2}{R}, Discard a card: Create three 1/1 red Shaman creature tokens. They can't block this turn.

card.name: Toshzi, the Thunder
card.text: Flying When Toshzi enters, choose up to one planeswalker, artifact, and land. Toshzi deals 5 damage to a planeswalker chosen this way, then destroy the rest.

card.name: Blastburn Salvo
card.text: Blastburn Salvo deals X damage to target creature or planeswalker, where X is 2 plus the greatest power among Dragons you control.

card.name: Molten Deluge
card.text: Molten Deluge deals 2 damage to each creature. Invoke the Dragons. (Begin or advance the Path of the Dragon.)

card.name: Untethered Spectacle
card.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. Then if mana from a Treasure was spent to cast this spell, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Sanguine Reproach
card.text: Sanguine Reproach deals 5 damage to target creature. Discard up to X cards, then draw that many cards, where X is the amount of excess damage dealt this way.

card.name: Smolder
card.text: Exile the top four cards of your library. You may play cards exiled this way until the end of your next turn, and you may cast up to one card with mana value 4 or less exiled this way without paying its mana cost. Invoke the Dragons. (Begin or advance the Path of the Dragon.)

card.name: Scales Etched in Stone
card.text: When Scales Etched in Stone enters, create an Idol token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.") At the beginning of combat on your turn, up to one target noncreature artifact you control becomes a 4/4 red Dragon creature with flying. Sacrifice it at end of combat.

card.name: Yadil Exhibits Tenacity
card.text: Invoke the Dragons. (Begin or advance the Path of the Dragon.) The next time a creature you control enters this turn, it deals damage equal to its power to any target. Yadil Exhibits Tenacity deals 2 damage to each opponent. Add {R}{R}.

card.name: Disciple of the Oridian
card.text: Hydra spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Whenever a Hydra you control enters, put a +1/+1 counter on Disciple of the Oridian.

card.name: Oaken Envoy
card.text: Reach, trample When Oaken Envoy enters, create an Idol token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.")

card.name: Shriving Piper
card.text: Prestige (Once when this deals combat damage to a player, you may put a +1/+1 counter on it to activate one of its abilities without paying the cost.) Sacrifice Shriving Piper: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Omnifang
card.text: Omnifang enters with a +1/+1 counter on it for each mana spent to cast it.

card.name: Virulent Zealot
card.text: When Virulent Zealot enters, create a 0/0 green Hydra creature token with two +1/+1 counters on it. Hydras you control have toxic 2. (Players dealt damage by Hydras you control also get two poison counters.)

card.name: Uthrun Hierophant
card.text: When Uthrun Hierophant enters, invoke the Hydras. You may play an additional land this turn. (Begin or advance the Path of the Hydra.)

card.name: Striding Cascade
card.text: Vigilance Whenever a +1/+1 counter is put on another creature you control, put a +1/+1 counter on Striding Cascade. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: Brackish Hydra
card.text: Whenever Brackish Hydra attacks, look at the top card of your library. If it's a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield tapped. If you don't put the card onto the battlefield, you may put it on the bottom of your library.

card.name: Everwilder Mentor
card.text: Whenever Everwilder Mentor attacks, target creature you control gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is your devotion to green. (Each {G} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to green.)

card.name: Selidith, the Hunger
card.text: Reach When Selidith enters, you gain 7 life. When Selidith dies, create a 0/0 green Hydra creature token with four +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Thrash of Fangs
card.text: Target creature you control and each other Hydra you control each deal damage equal to their power to target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls.

card.name: Hinterland Ceremony
card.text: Choose up to two permanent cards in your graveyard. Put each land card chosen this way on the battlefield tapped, then put the rest into your hand. Invoke the Hydras. (Begin or advance the Path of the Hydra.)

card.name: Verdant Tactics
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. Until end of turn, those creatures gain trample and can't be blocked by more than one creature.

card.name: Late Harvest
card.text: Enchant basic land Enchanted land has "{T}: Add {C}{C}."

card.name: Vidir Manifests Unity
card.text: Invoke the Hydras. (Begin or advance the Path of the Hydra.) Create two 1/1 green Snake creature tokens. Put four +1/+1 counters on target creature you control. Until end of turn, that creature can't be blocked by more than one creature and must be blocked if able.

card.name: Cycolith Harmonist
card.text: Creatures you control with flying get +1/+1. Whenever you attack with two or more creatures, draw a card.

card.name: Ebon Tomb Occultist
card.text: Whenever you draw your second card each turn, you may pay up to 3 life. The next spell you cast this turn costs {X} less to cast, where X is the amount of life paid this way.

card.name: Edgeland Barbarian
card.text: Whenever a player discards a card, Edgeland Barbarian deals 2 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Silversilt Reshaper
card.text: {T}: Add {R}{G}. {8}: Target land you control becomes a 5/5 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Blessed Andi
card.text: When Blessed Andi enters, create five Idol tokens. (They're artifacts with "{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.")

card.name: Notion Trafficker
card.text: When Notion Trafficker enters, target opponent reveals their hand. You may choose a nonland card from it or a creature that player controls and exile it. For as long that card remains exiled, its owner may play it. A spell cast this way costs {2} more to cast.

card.name: Patron of the Many-Faced
card.text: {BG}{BG}: Target creature gains deathtouch until end of turn. {BG}{BG}{BG}: Target creature must be blocked this turn if able.

card.name: Breaching Baleen
card.text: Reach When Breaching Baleen enters, reveal the top four cards of your library. Choose a land card and a nonland card from among them. Put the chosen cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Giltweave Mesmer
card.text: When Giltweave Mesmer enters, create a Treasure token. {1}, Sacrifice an artifact: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Intrepid Outrider
card.text: Flash When Intrepid Outrider enters, it deals 3 damage to target attacking or blocking creature an opponent controls.

card.name: Radiant Glade // Renown
card.text:
Radiant Glade enters tapped unless you control a Plains. {T}: Add {W}.
---
Invoke the Angels. (Begin or advance the Path of the Angel. Cast a copy of this spell once while this land is on the battlefield.)

card.name: Illustrious Falls // Expertise
card.text:
Illustrious Falls enters tapped unless you control an Island. {T}: Add {U}.
---
Invoke the Sphinxes. (Begin or advance the Path of the Sphinx. Cast a copy of this spell once while this land is on the battlefield.)

card.name: Liturgic Grotto // Covenant
card.text:
Liturgic Grotto enters tapped unless you control a Swamp. {T}: Add {B}.
---
Invoke the Demons. (Begin or advance the Path of the Demon. Cast a copy of this spell once while this land is on the battlefield.)

card.name: Eclipsed Highland // Majesty
card.text:
Eclipsed Highland enters tapped unless you control a Mountain. {T}: Add {R}.
---
Invoke the Dragons. (Begin or advance the Path of the Dragon. Cast a copy of this spell once while this land is on the battlefield.)

card.name: Untrodden Tangle // Persistence
card.text:
Untrodden Tangle enters tapped unless you control a Forest. {T}: Add {G}.
---
Invoke the Hydras. (Begin or advance the Path of the Hydra. Cast a copy of this spell once while this land is on the battlefield.)

card.name: Myriad Landscape
card.text: Myriad Landscape enters tapped. {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Myriad Landscape: Search your library for up to two basic land cards that share a land type, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Shrouded Citadel
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {3}, {T}: Target creature phases out. Activate only as a sorcery. (Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until its controller's next turn.)

card.name: Uplifting Thopter
card.text: Flying When Uplifting Thopter enters or dies, create an Idol token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.")

card.name: Unerring Blade
card.text: Flash When Unerring Blade enters, attach it to target attacking creature you control. Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has agile. (That creature deals combat damage first as long as it's attacking.) Equip {2}

card.name: Austere Quadralith
card.text: {T}: Target player exiles a card from their graveyard. {4}, {T}: Exile target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Galvanic Golem
card.text: When Galvanic Golem enters, it deals 6 damage to target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls.

card.name: Sacred Medallion
card.text: As Sacred Medallion enters, choose a color. Creatures you control of the chosen color get +1/+0 during your turn. Your devotion to the chosen color is increased by one.

card.name: Mithril Vein
card.text: {T}: Add {C}{C}. {1}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card unless you sacrifice a nonland permanent.

card.name: Icon of the Devout

card.text: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) Flying

card.text: Whenever another creature you control enters, you gain 1 life. If it's an Angel, you gain 2 life instead.

card.name: Ivory Forum Duelist

card.name: Angel of Guiding Light
card.text: Flying When Angel of Guiding Light enters, you gain 4 life. Plainscycling {1} ({1}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Plains card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

card.name: Reverent Sentinel
card.text: Vigilance Reverent Sentinel's power is equal to your devotion to white. (Each {W} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to white.)

card.name: Smite the Wretched
card.text: Smite the Wretched deals 2 damage to target tapped creature. If you control an Angel, exile that creature instead.

card.name: Take to the Heavens
card.text: Exile up to two target creatures. Return each card exiled this way to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step. Invoke the Angels. (Begin or advance the Path of the Angel.)

card.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. You gain 2 life.

card.name: Burden of Sacrilege

card.text: When Acolyte of Brilliance enters, invoke the Sphinxes. (Begin or advance the Path of the Sphinx.)

card.name: Eye of the Obelisk
card.text: Flying When Eye of the Obelisk enters, draw a card. Whenever you draw your second card each turn, target creature an opponent controls gets -2/-0 until end of turn.

card.name: Orian Pass Patrol
card.text: When Orian Pass Patrol enters, tap target creature an opponent controls, then put a number of stun counters on it equal to your devotion to blue. (Each {U} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to blue.)

card.name: Eternal Slumber
card.text: Enchanted creature When Eternal Slumber enters, tap enchanted creature, then invoke the Sphinxes. (Begin or advance the Path of the Sphinx.) Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

card.text: Search your library for a basic Island card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Path of the Demon ICO
card.text: Search your library for a basic Swamp card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Path of the Dragon ICO
card.text: Search your library for a basic Mountain card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Path of the Hydra ICO
card.text: Search your library for a basic Forest card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Arbiter of the Alliance
card.text: Flash Flying When Arbiter of the Alliance enters, until end of turn, abilities don't trigger.

card.name: Sheil, Academy Partisan
card.text: Flying, first strike, vigilance, lifelink

card.name: Virtuous Angel
card.text: Flying At the beginning of your end step, if you gained 4 or more life this turn, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying.

card.name: Archangel of Accord
card.text: Flying Concord — When Archangel of Accord enters, if there are four or more card types among permanents you control, destroy all other creatures.

card.name: Rivha, Heiress of Pinions
card.text: Flying Whenever Rivha and at least two other creatures attack, exile all other attacking creatures you control. For each creature exiled this way, create a 3/3 white Angel creature token with flying that's tapped and attacking.

card.name: Empress of Strahn
card.text: Flying, lifelink Whenever you would gain life, you may instead return target creature with power less than or equal to the amount of life you would have gained from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Ay'I, Temple Magister
card.text: Flying Whenever Ay'I attacks, name three cards, then search your library for a card with one of those names and exile it face down. Your opponent chooses one of those three names, then reveal the exiled card. If that card has a different name than the chosen name, you may cast it this turn without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Ay'I, the Templesworn
card.text: Flying Penance — {X}{U}{U}, Sacrifice Ay'I: Reveal the top X cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Clairvoyant Sphinx
card.text: Flying Whenever Clairvoyant Sphinx deals combat damage to a player, look at that player's hand.

card.name: Consecrated Guardian
card.text: Flying Whenever an opponent draws a card, create an Encounter token. (It's a colorless battle with 2 defense and "When this battle is defeated, draw a card and create a Treasure token.")

card.name: Maven of Misdirection
card.text: Flying Menagerie — Maven of Misdirection has shroud as long as there are five or more creature types among creatures you control.

card.name: Mhurio, the Fool's Hoard
card.text: Flying Whenever Mhurio attacks, reveal the top three cards of your library, then secretly exile one of them face down. An opponent chooses a card name, then reveal the exiled card. If that card doesn't have the chosen name, put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Bloodrift Overlord
card.text: Flying Whenever an opponent casts a spell, forebode. (Create a tapped colorless Omen artifact token with "{T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.") At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice an Omen or a Demon.

card.name: Bloodwoken Demon
card.text: Flying When Bloodwoken Demon enters, choose target creature card in your graveyard. If that card is reverent, return it to the battlefield. Otherwise, return it to your hand. (Angels, Clerics, and Demons are reverent.)

card.name: Kai'Dwo, Eternal Ravager
card.text: Flying When Kai'Dwo enters, create seven Idol tokens. (They're artifacts with "{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.") Whenever you sacrifice an Idol, each opponent sacrifices a creature.

card.name: Kai'Jun, the Annihilator
card.text: Flying, trample At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a non-Demon creature. Revive {2}{B}{B} ({2}{B}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it except it has no mana cost. Revive only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Lizhao, Last Breath of the Yenzu
card.text: Flying, lifelink Other Demons you control have flying and lifelink. If you would create a creature token, you may pay 5 life to create a 5/5 black Demon creature token instead.

card.name: Threzak, the Heinous
card.text: Flying When Threzak enters, choose up to three. You lose 3 life for each mode you choose. • Put three +1/+1 counters on Threzak. • Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. • Draw three cards.

card.name: Emissary of Antiquity
card.text: Flying, haste Whenever Emissary of Antiquity deals combat damage to a player, you may cast an instant or sorcery spell with mana value 3 or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Giradrus, Ashen Master
card.text: Flying Whenever Giradrus enters or attacks, look at the top eight cards of your library. You may put a Dragon card from among them onto the battlefield. If Giradrus is attacking, that Dragon enters tapped and attacking. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Hadra, the Last Dragon
card.text: Flying Whenever a source you control deals damage to one or more creatures an opponent controls, put a +1/+1 counter on Hadra. Whenever a source you control deals damage to an opponent, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card from exile for as long as you control Hadra.

card.name: Seething Snapjaw
card.text: Flying When Seething Snapjaw enters, discard your hand, then hoard three times. (Create a Treasure token. If you control at least two Treasures, you may draw a card instead.)

card.name: Tseng, the Shooting Star
card.text: Flying Lands you control have "{T}: Add {R}{R}. This land deals 2 damage to you." {R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R}: Shuffle, then exile the top three cards of your library. You may cast one of them without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Wreckage Ravager
card.text: Flying, haste Whenever Wreckage Ravager attacks or becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, create a Junk token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.")

card.name: Fungahydra
card.text: Fungahydra enters with X +1/+1 counters on it. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Fungahydra: Add {G}. You gain 1 life.

card.name: Jungle Hydra
card.text: Jungle Hydra enters with a +1/+1 counter on it for each Forest you control. Whenever a Forest you control enters, double the number of +1/+1 counters on Jungle Hydra and it gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Nacreous Hydra
card.text: Trample Nacreous Hydra enters with four +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever a player casts a spell, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

card.name: Pelagic Hydra
card.text: Pelagic Hydra enters with seven +1/+1 counters on it. {1}{G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Pelagic Hydra. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Pelagic Hydra: It deals 1 damage to target creature blocking or blocked by it.

card.name: Qiyan, Great Progenitor
card.text: Trample Qiyan enters with twice X +1/+1 counters on them. If damage would be dealt to Qiyan while they have a +1/+1 counter on them, prevent that damage, remove that many +1/+1 counters from Qiyan, and create a 0/0 green Hydra creature token with twice that many +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Thriving Hydra
card.text: Trample, haste Thriving Hydra enters with four +1/+1 counters on it. When Thriving Hydra enters, for each other creature you control, put X +1/+1 counters on that creature, where X is four minus its power. Whenever Thriving Hydra attacks, double the number of +1/+1 counters on each creature you control.
